website_summaries.verdict: This popular brand has earned a loyal following, but the applicator-free design may not be for everyone. Choose these if you find applicators difficult or inconvenient to use.
pros: Ultra compact design makes these tampons the most portable on our list
No applicator to throw away means there's less waste
Highly absorbent cotton with fluid-lock grooves doesn't easily leak
cons: If you're accustomed to using applicator tampons, inserting these correctly may take some practice

customer_reviews.title: Try these if you have ridiculously heavy periods!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems strange to write a tampon review but here goes. These work better than any other super plus tampons on the market. I can usually soak through a tampax/playtex/kotex in under 1 hour but these actually last several hours on day 1-2! Don't be grossed out by the lack of an applicator. It's not that hard to get used to. I've also tried the regular and those are really good as well. But, I prefer these for the longevity!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY & EASE OF USE
customer_reviews.text: Why anyone uses applicator types is beyond me... These are so much easier to use & environmentally friendly, not creating applicator waste and bulky wrappers. They work better than any other type of tampon I have ever tried. No embarrassing failure moments
customer_reviews.author: Lynk

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. I ONLY use OB and the plastic wrap on these is oddly ridiculously impossible to open to the point that you end up not sure if you have removed all of the plastic and potentially risk your LIFE by having plastic wrapper in your body. Wish I could report this company for such an irresponsible decision.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Torbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and less packaging
customer_reviews.text: As an Australian, trying to find quality tampons in the US that don't fall apart in two seconds and aren't covered in a ridiculous amount of plastic packaging is near impossible. These are great! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: fmf

customer_reviews.title: Great, Cheap Tampons and Environmentally Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons. Not only are they cheap (they cost about the same as tampons at the bulk store), but they don't have an applicator. This makes them smaller (easier to put into a pocket or small purse!), more discreet, and better for the environment! They also come in ultra, a size that I never even knew existed. This size has changed my period game. I no longer have to change my tampons every 2-3 hours; I can now go 4-6 hours running to the bathroom! If you're looking for the collection power of a cup but the convenience of a tampon, choose these!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to unwrap
customer_reviews.text: OB has been around for some time now and it's amazing to me that after all this time, they still cannot make the plastic wrapper around the tampon easier to remove. I have to go to the next and the next before finding one that's usable, even had to get a scissors to open these things. These can add up and become very expensive with having to throw away so many. I like the size and the fact that they're obserbent. It's worse than the wrapper around a CD.
customer_reviews.author: Topaz

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand since the 1980s. A nurse told me women have less chance of TSS if the lubricant the tampon. I also read that tampons with applicators have been sold with mold growing on the cotton. At least with OBs you know what you're getting. I'm happy I can order the size I want from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Wedlake

customer_reviews.title: Non-Applicator Tampon = Less Waste
customer_reviews.text: These tampons do not come with an applicator - which means you need to use your own finger to insert the tampon. This does not work well for everyone. These tampons are very good though at absorbing without leakage. They are made in a way to block the opening so that nothing spills. I like to use the variety pack and have them on my subscribe and save orders as a routine purchase each month. I use about 3/4 a box per monthly cycle. I recommend pairing them with some zipper closure bags and toilet paper for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite and easiest to use
customer_reviews.text: These have been my favorite for decades. Really missed them when this size was not distributed for a while. It is wonderfully absorbent, easy to carry around discreetly and less messy to use than dealing with applicators where you might not get it right where you need it to work well. I hope these never go away. Good value when I purchased it here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These hurt.
customer_reviews.text: GET PRO COMFORT OB, not just the regular kind These are horribly painful to put in. Awwwful. I ordered them because I wanted to stop using tampons with plastic applicators and these happened to be the first line of OB I bought. Even during heavy flow it hurt HORRIBLY to put these in. I'm glad I tried OB brand again because once I switched to Pro Comfort it was much better. So get those.
customer_reviews.author: J Solognier

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: This tampon was the worst product I’ve ever had the displeasure of using. It asks you to create your own applicator by sticking your finger into the tampon instead which doesn’t sound anywhere close to a good idea and that’s why no one else does it. Calling yourself organic doesn’t make your tampon hurting and falling out all day acceptable, ob. I’m positive a man who hates women created this tampon. This tampon is intended to keep women out of the work force. You will lose time and money trying to make it just be a tampon. Learn from my mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: use these for your transition to a menstrual cup
customer_reviews.text: These were my go-to tampons for many years. Other brands just don't compare for leak protection, as long as you flange the end as directed. It is also a good segue to get you accustomed to putting your hands up there on the regular while you have a period, if you wish to transition to a menstrual cup. I did so recently and wished I'd done so a very long time ago. Way better for the environment and the wallet, and less risk of TSS
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.Gallogly

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience ever
customer_reviews.text: These will absorb for about 10 minutes then they are trash. It's a horrible experience applying it. It has a rough material that hurts. There is absolutely nothing good about these. I've only switched once in my life and it will be the last for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but they're kind of unwieldy to use. First, the outer plastic should come off in one piece. If I was very careful and slow it would separate as two, but often it was 3 pieces, which is a lot for a tampon. It's especially problematic if the plastic decides to stick to your hands due to static. They're also kind of messy to use, as you might expect... However, as they are more environmentally friendly waste-wise than normal tampons, I would continue to use these. I also appreciate that they are seriously small (no bulky packaging!). You can hide them anywhere and keep a bunch in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not expand or protect against leakage
customer_reviews.text: I am very displeased with this product. I am still trying to figure out how they work. After fumbling around and trying to get this opened for about 10 minutes, I figured out you have to peel back the yellow strip. I expected way more absorbency from OB but they barely expand and did not protect against leakage. It also hurts when trying to insert them. I will not be using again.
customer_reviews.author: lynore

customer_reviews.title: To be earth conscious or not to be
customer_reviews.text: While tampons have been stated to not be good for our bodies, I wanted to be a little more earth consious by doing away with plastic applicators. Well, these didnt work out for me. Was not a easy slide in process like plastic applicator tampons, which was surprising. Directions say you can use lube if necessary. For me, its just not worth it. Guess I'll have to find other ways to be earth conscious! 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Very painful to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they use less packaging and waste. But let me tell you- for some women they can be exceptionally painful to use without an applicator. I struggle to get these is and they don't go as far up as tampons with an applicator. Once it is is, it feels painful all day. I just couldn't keep these in very long. They are very absorbant but I think I'll have to stick to tampons with applicators.
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: Should of known!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product however in our stores here in Hawaii they always run out of this size. I think that this was the best price and the fastest shipping ever. I stocked up and I bought me four packs! I will be purchasing again in the future to save me from running to four different stores and finding out that they were sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as in stores!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using OB for probably 20yrs. These are not the same as the kind you buy in the store. I don't know if they are from a different manufacturer is what, but the plastic wrap is insane to get open! I'm canceling my subscription and just going back to purchasing in the store.
customer_reviews.author: MLFrantz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful switch.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this type of tampon at 30 years of age. I have to say it's been a great switch. Once you get used to them, they are so comfortable and so easy to carry around anywhere. I love these so much. Like I said though, it does take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #1 for women
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. Says that they have the most comfortable shape. She also likes the very thin (but reliable) braid because it doesn't lead to shafting and irritation like thicker braids (Tampax). And since they are applicator-free, they are very discreet and easy to hide in your palm.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Have Been Using for Years, favorite Brand
customer_reviews.text: Small and discrete, I love these tampons. You will literally never feel "safer" from leak protection with any other product. They are better for the environment, fit discreetly in a purse/book bags, and do a great job! It would be hard for me to switch to any other brand. These also tend to be less expensive and still provide higher quality than other applicator free and or organic brands.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Bon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand and applicator free tampons since my very first time wearing tampons in my teenage years. The small size makes it so easy to keep in my car, purse or even the small pocket made for pocket watches back in the olden days. It comes in all the sizes to make sure it meets my different period needs from super heavy to ultra light. I love how it reduces the packaging and allows for a greener foot print.
customer_reviews.author: Ktn145

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I got these in an attempt to be more eco-friendly. They are hard to open and very uncomfortable. So absorbent they are difficult to get in and out and they are too big. However, if you cut it longways and shove it up your nose, it works well for a nose bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good value and less waste
customer_reviews.text: I tried these because it was quite a bit cheaper than buying ones that have an applicator. It's not difficult to place them like I was worried it might be. They are absorbent and a good shape, not too long like some of the other brands. Since there are no applicators, they are tiny and you can keep one or two in your pocket or make-up bag without it being noticed. And best of all, you don't have a nasty, used applicator to put in the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Hyzenthlay

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in cotton form
customer_reviews.text: They plug the hole and keep it locked. Less waste and very Inconspicuous. One fell out of my pocket and my supervisor picked it up, looked at it, and handed it back to me, no awkward exchange involved. If you are a women and don’t mind giving a little helping hand to insert, these little guys are designed for you. I’ve been buying them for years and just figured out amazon will subscribe these suckers. Guess who would need to run out last minuet for more now?!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using OB tampons since high school and they are by far more comfortable than applicator tampons and the protection is much better too. I love the variation in sizes as well. These are the only tampons that can get me through the heavy days.
customer_reviews.author: stornetn

customer_reviews.title: What’s life without a little pain?
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate these when I first started my period because they were extremely difficult to use as they come without an applicator. Reading the reviews, I decided to give this a try because I tend to bleed heavily during my cycle. And... it gets the job done! And a good choice for the environment. Just be warned that if your area is in the dryer side it will HURT to insert. Your entire body will cringe, mine did and it was not a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree May

customer_reviews.title: Bloodletting pro
customer_reviews.text: I have several days of moonmadness, and the flow can be heavy or light depending on the dirtbag uterus.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrun Rogue

customer_reviews.title: A girls best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for Amazon during the Corona Virus. People holding t.p. AND tampons. Smh.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Holl

customer_reviews.title: Discreet mama
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Discreet, not a lot of access garbage to dispose of. Always been neverous about trying these because I was so used to applicators and worried about my hands getting dirty. But it’s super easy and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Yemi A.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same size as in Israel.
customer_reviews.text: For people buying from Israel - please notice that this "super plus" is not the same as in Israel. This size is equal to "super" size of Israel! If you want the "super plus" that we use in Israel, you need to buy the "Ultara" size. Personally I didn't find an ultra size that is shipped to Israel. The tampons are good, but the package came a bit turned. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure these are knock offs... Eiw
customer_reviews.text: When compared to the “OB” I bought at Target, they are a different shape, and these do not have the “trademark” symbol after the OB logo like the others do... also didn’t work as well. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana L

customer_reviews.title: Lesson learned
customer_reviews.text: I tried these a while back and figured I’d try them again. Clearly I avoided them all those years for a reason. I give them overall two stars for the fact that they don’t use plastic which in turn is helpful to our environment. Other than that, they’re crap.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Receive monthly on Auto subscribe
customer_reviews.text: Great that I don't need to go into the store and get delivered to home for pricing that is great. OB is only tampon used as they absorb better than others. Got too used to stores being out of the ones used.
customer_reviews.author: T. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Seriously you need these
customer_reviews.text: If you are a woman and you get periods then you need these tampons. They are cheap but work really really really well, there is never any leakage so you don’t have to ever worry about it. I get them delivered once every 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Sarah amador

customer_reviews.title: That’s Much Better!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons! So easy to pop in without having to connect a plastic applicator and then dispose of it. Less waste and perfect for when you are in public. Also, no more plastic paper in my purse from my tampons unraveling!
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. I've used these for years. However, I recieved the wrong absorption size, and couldn't use them. Amazon made it right though But the product itself is 100%
customer_reviews.author: J.Lo

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up tons of blood
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. They are a necessity purchase. They do what they are intended to do: soak up blood... lots of blood. My local store doesn't carry them so Amazon came to the rescue.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Trainer woofs

customer_reviews.title: Great value/product
customer_reviews.text: First time trying these tampons- i always wondered about them each month while in the grocery picking up tampons . I will continue to order these. Great value, great product . They are much more discrete than the typical tampon. Make sure to read the instructions on how to use them if it’s your first time since there’s no applicator ! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: If you think about how many tampons you've used and you're going to use in your lifetime, that's a lot of wasted plastic and/or paper from applicators. These are amazing because they don't have applicators! And it's fine. I'm probably going to use these for the rest of my life. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Sato

customer_reviews.title: Box was destroyed, for sanitary products
customer_reviews.text: If they weren’t needed, I would have sent them back. The box was destroyed and it gave my wife doubts about the product, if she didn’t need them I would have sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yolish

customer_reviews.title: The best protection
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for over 20 years. The best protection I have ever had. I like the fact a female doctor designed them. It's also a plus that you can get them with or without an applicator. It really is the only brand I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Nattlie Monjay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just wish that it didn't come with plastic on each one of them and it was more eco-friendly but this is pretty eco-friendly and it is very well made in a good product
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons. They are super absorbent, and I love that they don’t have an applicator, which seem wasteful and also uncomfortable to use. This is the only brand I’ll buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mushoobug

customer_reviews.title: Great tampons with less wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very small and discreet and best of all there not a lot of extra wasteful packaging. Think of all that plastic (and cardboard) that goes into applicators and wrappers on most tampons. These guys are absorbent and provide great protection. You do need to insert with a finger but that is super easy to do!
customer_reviews.author: realtalk

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it keeps me from leaking for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: Best tampon out there!
customer_reviews.text: Will not go back to any other pad or tampon again.. minimal waste, discrete packaging and works perfect.. someone let me borrow one once and have never used anything else since! I buy the variety pack for different flow days
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for decades and love that they don't contribute excess plastic to landfills. They are close to $8 a box at Walgreens and around $6 a box at Target. Just over $4 is an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney B.

customer_reviews.title: didnt like it
customer_reviews.text: i think its really bad they didn't even sent it on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand my entire life. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: BeckiMae

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I typically have a heavy flow. these are Very comfortable and easy to use. I am a big fan of the less packaging that comes along with it. They are also very easy to put in. I am a big fan and really appreciate the comfort, absorbency, and protection that this Product provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried...but I just can’t
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, just say no. Using your finger as the applicator..not okay. Especially in public restrooms (YUCK) no one needs those kind of germs being spread around.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Loper

customer_reviews.title: These are ULTRA. They are like four regulars in one!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing if you know things are going to be heavy and you need to not be changing tampons every 2 hours. Just be aware that these are quite large and can be a little intimidating.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to never have to use these again ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to never have to use these again, but until that blissful day many years from now, thanks, O.B.!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Only tampons I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used these since I was a teenager. I started buying them online because I cannot reliably find them in stores. I wish there were more applicator-free options, but these are reliably great.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Meppelink

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow These ARE HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how big these would be but my flow has been horrendous and Ive been leaking though. These do the job. nothing gets past them. The first time I used it I was afraid I wouldn't be able to get it out but it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Kisil

customer_reviews.title: Best tampons ever, don't need an applicator
customer_reviews.text: The only thing more earth-conscious is getting a menstrual cup. If you don't want to invest in that yet, use OB tampons. They don't have applicators, and they come in four different sizes. The ultras are great for when you're running, traveling, or playing sports. Can also find them overseas. They're expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Scorzoni

customer_reviews.title: Much less waste than normal tampons but does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these! Much less waste than normal tampons but does the job perfectly! ❤️ Beware that they do not have aplicators to insurt them with. You must use your finger. This works perfectly for me but others may not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what really to say about tampons. With OB I truly like the comfort, the fact that you can put it in your pocket and no one would even know. Recently I have not been able to find super plus in my local store, So I was truly excited to be able to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Surface is too rough for painless insertion/removal
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the Pro Comfort variety, these tampons have a very rough cotton surface. Repeated insertion and removal is a nightmare because there's too much friction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish they sold these in the store but...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for bringing this product back OB for those that heavy flows! It won’t leak. It’s the bomb.

customer_reviews.title: Total protection
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how anyone could use a different brand. When I was a old enough to use tampons I always had accidents with other brands. My mom recommended these and I've been using them for 15 years. I wore a all white uniform for 5 years and never had an accident. I now recommend them to any women who complains about their brand.
customer_reviews.author: canvas82

customer_reviews.title: Great tampons
customer_reviews.text: Love these tampons but they dont carry this size in any store near me. Glad i could fond them here.
customer_reviews.author: AmberMarie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite tampons have used them for years. Was unable to find them in my local store. I could only find them in a multi pack. Amazon saved the day
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tampons. I’ve never had problems with leaks which I have had with others. The lack of an applicator is nice because easy to carry and be discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: Just what you need, nothing you dont. Doesnt come with an applicator, you can flush the trash down the toilet. You can toss a bunch of these in your bag
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open & cotton seperates
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is wrapped very close to the tampon and makes it very hard and frustrating trying to open. No one wants to spend 2 to 5 minutes trying to open a tampon. Some of the cotton fluffed off at times and that concerns me. I would hate for that to happen to a woman and part get retained that they were un aware of and make them sick. I won't personally order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, less waste
customer_reviews.text: I always had trouble using tampons with the applicator. These tampons don't have one, and I find them sooooo much easier to insert. The absence of an applicator also means generating less trash, which I like
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: fear not
customer_reviews.text: i love this product. i dont know why everybody doesn't use this. its comfortable with less waste.
customer_reviews.author: sinda xchaefer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: My cycles are heavy and intense.Even with these I need to change every 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: superb!
customer_reviews.text: these work great. best I have ever found. And super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! Game changer for clothing with tiny pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Super discreet, fits in any pocket, and the least waste!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say they work the best out of all other brands
customer_reviews.author: BrokenAngel

customer_reviews.title: Ok for 5 out of 6 boxes
customer_reviews.text: Received timely but a box out of six was open and 4 tampons were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Single Use Plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are still the best tampons I've found but the amount of packaging it came with was obscene. So much single use plastic I felt terrible for purchasing it. Plastic films, etc. are not recyclable by the majority of curbside recycling programs. We need to come up with a better way of packaging tampons!
customer_reviews.author: mikehla

customer_reviews.title: Worst tampon
customer_reviews.text: Worst tampon ever. A cotton bullet you have to push up into yourself. Extremely uncomfortable trying to force cotton up there. As if I couldn't be more irritated on my cycle
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Always a great value. Will not buy any other kind
customer_reviews.author: Blaze & Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall to these types of tampons is there is no applicator, but the packability for small spaces is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: No plastic applicator to add to the landfills. Cotton and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Love these they are easy and work well for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rae Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best tampon
customer_reviews.text: Only tampon I have used since discovering the brand years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Longtime ob user
customer_reviews.text: Longtime ob user. I like the control I get without an applicator, and it doesn't hurt that it produces less waste. Glad to learn there is a subscription service
customer_reviews.author: F. Di

customer_reviews.title: Packed like a box of pistol bullets!
customer_reviews.text: So funny when you open the box the tampons are packed just like a box of bullets! I like that i waste less plastic with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only kind I use
customer_reviews.text: Only kind I use and they are getting harder to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size and made of quality natural material
customer_reviews.text: Good size and made of quality natural material. Will continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So much better than plastic applicators
customer_reviews.text: So much better than plastic applicators, cleaner, less waste, better material, better absorbency. The American tampons are just a joke next to this
customer_reviews.author: Nora Murry

customer_reviews.title: Less waste!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to have a good product with less waste, this is the one! It's a great way to not have trash from the applicators but still have the absorption you need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No other brand compares
customer_reviews.text: The one and only brand I'll use. Once I tried O.b tampons I've never looked back. Unbeatable protection, comfortable, discreet, and less waste with no applicator. I would give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: BIG-N-SMALL

customer_reviews.title: Not really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was me but it really hard to put in and when I finally put it inside it feels like something stuck there very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sissi

customer_reviews.title: Great but stringy
customer_reviews.text: Soft, easy to carry tampons but they do seem to come apart a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best damn tampon out there
customer_reviews.text: Well, I never thought I’d write a review for a tampon, but the OB Ultra is just the best damn tampon out there. If you fan out the base as the directions explain, it won’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: molly crews

customer_reviews.title: Original ones
customer_reviews.text: They seem like the regular ones I get a drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Arredondo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since ever. ;) No need for an applicator. So easy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are the best and it’s nice to have the option of buying a full box with all regular absorbency. My local stores only sell the combo boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.text: Im trying to use less plastic and these come wrapped in PLASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: AlysonKay1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I chose not to use this product because the package was previously open and taped closed with packing tape. There was no damage to the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Absorbency - just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These ultra absorbency tampons work well for very heavy flow days. They definitely last longer than the super absorbency version.
customer_reviews.author: AM a Rebel

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tampons ever made
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tampons ever made. They're so small, easy to pack and take with me, and simple. I hate all the extra parts other tampons have. These are hard to find in Puerto Rico, so I get them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best tampon ever
customer_reviews.text: I use these to clog toilets in my bosses office.. awesome, and he thinks its his admin assistant! LOL must buy! ok just kidding..
customer_reviews.author: Small H.

product_meta.title: o.b. Original Non-Applicator Tampons, Regular, Super, & Super Plus Absorbancies, Multi Pack of 40 Tampons
product_meta.description: Style:Multipack (Regular/Super/Super+)92 pantiliners.. Ingredients- Rayon and/or Cotton Fiber; Polyester/Polyethylene Cover; Polypropylene, Cotton, or Polyester String.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
